packages.name: Condition-Monitoring-Device-1-Firmware
packages.summary: Firmware for an industrial condition-monitoring device acquiring multi-domain sensor data and exposing it to higher-level CM software.

packages.name: Condition-Monitoring-Device-1-Real-Time-OS
packages.summary: Real-time OS providing deterministic acquisition and processing of condition monitoring data.

packages.name: Condition-Monitoring-Device-1-Signal-Conditioning-and-DAQ
packages.summary: Signal conditioning, ADC and sampling engine for vibration, strain, temperature, pressure and other process sensors.

packages.name: Condition-Monitoring-Device-1-Feature-Extraction-and-Analytics
packages.summary: Local processing for FFTs, statistical features, trend calculation, alarm limits and rule-based evaluation of machine condition.

packages.name: Condition-Monitoring-Device-1-Industrial-Communication-Stacks
packages.summary: Ethernet/EtherCAT and higher-level interfaces (e.g., OPC UA, MQTT, Modbus TCP) to connect to SCADA, MES, and condition-monitoring platforms.

packages.name: Condition-Monitoring-Device-1-Historian-and-Cloud-Client
packages.summary: Client for sending time-series data to historian/TSDB backends and cloud services for long-term storage and analytics.

packages.name: Condition-Monitoring-Device-1-Event-and-Rule-Engine
packages.summary: Rules management and event engine generating deviation notifications, alarms and trend warnings based on configured thresholds and rules.

packages.name: Condition-Monitoring-Device-1-Local-UI-and-Dashboard-Agent
packages.summary: Embedded web/UI agent providing live charts, historical plots and device configuration for condition monitoring parameters.

packages.name: Condition-Monitoring-Device-1-Security-and-Access-Control
packages.summary: Authentication, roles/permissions, secure communication and firmware update mechanisms for the CM device.
